posts.message:
Simple Example for SQL Loops:
--------------------------------------
USE BlueSystem

DECLARE @ROW_VALUE INT --الإعلان عن متغير من نوع عدد صحيح
DECLARE @ROW_MAX_VALUE INT --الإعلان عن متغير من نوع عدد صحيح

SET @ROW_VALUE = 0 --إعطاء قيمة صفر للمتغير
SET @ROW_MAX_VALUE = (SELECT MAX(tblCategories.catID) FROM tblCategories) --إعطاء المتغير أكبر قيمة في حقل رقم المجموعة

WHILE (@ROW_VALUE <= @ROW_MAX_VALUE) --بداية حلقة تتوقف حينما تتساوى قيمة المتغير الأول بالمتغير الثاني ألا وهي أخر أو أكبر قيمة موجودة في حقل رقم المجموعة
BEGIN
SET @ROW_VALUE = (SELECT TOP 1 tblCategories.catID FROM tblCategories WHERE tblCategories.catID > @ROW_VALUE ORDER BY tblCategories.catID) --إعطاء قيمة رقم المجموعة التي قيمتها أكبر من قيمة المتغير الحالية
PRINT @ROW_VALUE --طباعة نتيجة المتغير على الشاشة
END

---Best Wishes, Omar Negm

Title: Software Quality Assurance Engineer 
Job Description:
• Test results analysis.
• Test automation implementation.
• Development of test processes to improve test efficiency.
• Root cause analysis of software and hardware related issues.
• Work with development engineers to drive to closure on problems found, including recreating failures and verifying fixes.
Qualifications:

o B.Sc. in Computer Science or related discipline.
o Minimum one years of testing experience.
o Fundamental knowledge of software development lifecycles.
o Microsoft SQL Server query building fundamental knowledge.
o Knowledge in testing tools and bug tracking is an asset.
o Knowledge in test automation is an asset.
o Experience in testing web applications.
o Excellent problem solving and trouble shooting skills.
o Strong organizational and time management skills with ability to meet tight time-lines.
o Ability to work and thrive in a physically disperse team environment.

To Apply, Send your CV to jobs@drbridge.com with “Software QA Engineer” in the subject

Senior .NET Developer

We are looking for a senior .NET developer experienced in building back-end components with high maintainability and performance. To Help building value challenging solutions and components.

ESSENTIAL JOB FUNCTIONS

• Builds software applications – Follows coding standards, builds appropriate unit tests, integration tests and deployment scripts
• Assists in defining software architectures – Collaborates with leads to explore existing systems, determines areas of complexity, potential risks to successful implementation, learns the applications capabilities
• Owns success – Takes responsibility for successful delivery of the solutions
• Help performing technical research to gain technical knowledge and resolve technical difficulties. 
• Participate in the analysis of new functional requirement and systems. 
• Participate in the estimation of new features, and components. 
• Leads 1 to 3 Junior developers and give them help and support.

REQUIRED SKILLS

• Bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related field.
• Proven experience of .NET as programming skills (C#, ASP.NET, and ADO.NET,… )
• Proven experience of database architecture and design (SQL Server, MySQL). 
• Excitement about emerging web technologies such as HTML5 and CSS3
• Excellent understanding of OOP, n-tier architecture and design patterns. 
• Well versed in software engineering principles, frameworks and technologies.
• Excellent communication skills
• Self-directed team player who thrives in a continually changing environment
• Good knowledge in MVC 
• Knowledge ASP.NET MVC is a big plus.
• Knowledge in LINQ is a plus.
• Knowledge in JSON is a plus. 
• Knowledge in WCF and WPF is a plus 
• Knowledge in SharePoint is a plus
• Knowledge in Silverlight is a plus.
• 3-5 years' experience in the above competencies. 

If you are interested forward your CV to mohamed.elkerdany@gmail.com with title "Senior .NET Developer"
